name: Spacetime for Felines
description:
Your spaceship is in a sorry state and unfortunately, you're getting canned for it! What's a Space-Cat to do? Dodge the Out-of-Control Time Anomalies & keep your Oxygen Tanks filled as you find your crewmates' farewell letters. Find enough letters to crack the code to the ship's safe, where a tasty helping of Catnip awaits!

Controls: 

Jetpack: [Space]  or [Left Mouse] or [W]

Turn: [A] & [D] or [<] & [>]

Pause: [ESC] or [F10]
